name: Aleksandr Grebenko
subtitle: Elegant Finance, Reliable Technology
roles: Business Systems Analyst | Fintech Solution Architect
tagline: Bridging Business Vision with Digital Precision
aboutText: I specialize in business systems analysis, product ownership, and solution architecture for fintech and banking. I translate complex business needs into robust, scalable digital solutions, aligning strategic goals with technical feasibility. My approach combines the discipline of classic finance with a modern product mindset.
